WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for logging this issue. We've moved to a new codebase on GitHub; please try your issue against the new compiler (once possible) and log an issue on the GitHub site if it still reproduces.
WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

the grammar requires an IntegerLiteral.

ConstantEnumMemberSection:
  PropertyName   =   IntegerLiteral
  PropertyName   =   IntegerLiteral   ,   ConstantEnumMembers

AmbientEnumMember:
  PropertyName
  PropertyName   =   IntegerLiteral

However IngegerLiteral is not specified, I couldn't find it in the referenced ECMA spec either.
The open source parser parses a value?

Is the following rule missing?

IntegerLiteral
  : DecimalIntegerLiteral
  | HexIntegerLiteral
;


Best Regards,
Bernhard

Comments.Message: Good catch, we'll get that added to the spec.
